comment.message:
How many moves the snakes can make before the playable area shrinks.
Special values:
-1: Disabled, area will not shrink.
 0: The playable area's current width. Shrinks faster and faster.

FourSymmetry:
When one is eaten, all get renewed.
FourRandom_asymmetric:
When one is eaten, all get renewed.
RandomOnePerWorm_asymmetric:
When one is eaten, only it get renewed.
AppleLess:
Sets rules.startLength to infinity and rules.movesPerBorderShrink to -1.
